ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Cluster-Tango Predicted Scientific Events (PSE), JSOC Parameter (JP), 0.016 s Data
ResourceHeader.Description:
Cluster Predicted Scientific Events generated by the Joint Science Operations Centre, JSOC. See M.A. Hapgood et al., The Joint Science Operations Centre, Space Sci. Rev., 79, 487-525, 1997.
                   AP _ Apogee

ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: M.A. Hapgood. Refer to Cluster Science Data System (CSDS) for Rules of Acknowledgement Refer to Cluster Science Data System (CSDS) for Rules of Use.

InformationURL.Name: Cluster Science Archive, CSA, Web Page
InformationURL.Description: Web Page for access to High-Time Resolution Data from the Cluster and Double Star Missions

InformationURL.Name: Cluster Science Data System, CSDS, Web Page
InformationURL.Description: The Cluster Science Working Team along with the ESA Cluster Project Team have established the Cluster Science Data System, CSDS, a distributed Set of Data Centres, most of which are associated with one or more of the Cluster Experiments. With Software provided by the Experiment Team, each Data Centre processes the Data and then exchanges them with all the other Centres to obtain a full Data Set in a standard Format.

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via ftp from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data in CDF Format via http from SPDF

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Access to ASCII, CDF, and Plots via NASA/GSFC CDAWeb

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: M.A. Hapgood. Refer to Cluster Science Data System (CSDS) for Rules of Acknowledgement Refer to Cluster Science Data System (CSDS) for Rules of Use. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these Data.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: M.A. Hapgood. Refer to Cluster Science Data System (CSDS) for Rules of Acknowledgement Refer to Cluster Science Data System (CSDS) for Rules of Use. Please acknowledge the Data Providers and CDAWeb when using these Data.

Parameter.Name: Half Interval
Parameter.Description: Half Interval, equal to Half of the Separation between Time Tags averaged of the over the File

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time Tags
Parameter.Description: Epoch Time Tags, the Interval centred Time Tag, rounded to nearest Millisecond
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter exhibits an increasing Monotonic Progression.

Parameter.Name: Event Code for Predicted Spacecraft Event
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Event Code for Predicted Spacecraft Event, PSE, not for Plotting

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Orbit Number
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Orbit Number, Integer Part, Non-Event Times not plotted

Parameter.Name: Event Code Sub Type
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Event Code Sub Type, not for Plotting

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Orbit Phase
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Orbit Phase, Fractional Part, Non-Event Times not plotted

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Position, Predicted Latitude
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Position, Predicted Latitude, Elevation Angle from Ecliptic Plane, Non-Event Times not plotted

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Position, Predicted Magnetic Local Time
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Position, Predicted Magnetic Local Time, MLT, Non-Event Times not plotted

Parameter.Name: Predicted Spacecraft Position Vector, Geocentric Solar Ecliptic Cartesian Coordinates, at the Predicted Spacecraft Event Time
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH__C3_JP_PSE
Parameter.Description: Predicted Spacecraft Position Vector, Geocentric Solar Ecliptic, GSE, Cartesian Coordinates, at the Predicted Spacecraft Event, PSE, Time, Non-Event Times not plotted
